alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 10:58AM EST until further notice by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Huron River Near Hamburg affecting Livingston County. For the Huron River...including Milford, Hamburg, Ann Arbor... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Huron River near Hamburg. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.7 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM EST.
